item.title: Best VPN for Android (and PC) in 2017
item.description: A VPN service is a must-have to secure your traffic over the public Internet. There are several major benefits: – Privacy: hide your activity from your ISP (or anyone else who might be watching) – Encryption: protect your traffic on public WiFi networks – Circumvention of restrictions: access services blocked by your school, work, ISP
